traits.name: Sea Elf Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the spear, trident, light crossbow, and net.

traits.name: Child of the Sea
traits.description: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet, and you can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Friend of the Sea
traits.description: Using gestures and sounds, you can communicate simple ideas with any beast that has an innate swimming speed.
